metadata.title: General Flaws
metadata.description: Character flaws available to all characters, not specific to magic

flaws.name: Clumsy
flaws.description: You are awkward and prone to accidents.
flaws.effects: Subtract 3 from rolls involving careful physical coordination. You tend to drop things and trip at inopportune moments.

flaws.name: Cowardly
flaws.description: You are easily frightened and avoid danger.
flaws.effects: Make a Brave roll (difficulty 9+) to face serious danger. Subtract 3 from rolls to resist fear effects.

flaws.name: Cursed
flaws.description: You suffer from supernatural bad luck.
flaws.effects: Once per session, the storyguide may force you to reroll any successful roll, taking the worse result.

flaws.name: Dark Secret
flaws.description: You harbor a secret that would cause serious problems if revealed.
flaws.effects: You have done something shameful or illegal. If discovered, face serious social or legal consequences.

flaws.name: Deaf
flaws.description: You cannot hear sounds.
flaws.effects: Complete hearing loss. Cannot learn languages normally, automatic failure on hearing-based rolls.

flaws.name: Diabolic Past
flaws.description: You have dealings with demons in your history.
flaws.effects: Demons know you and may seek you out. You are more susceptible to Infernal corruption.

flaws.name: Enemies
flaws.description: Someone or some group actively opposes you.
flaws.effects: You have enemies who will periodically cause problems. They actively work against your interests.

flaws.name: Fragile Constitution
flaws.description: You tire easily and recover slowly from exertion.
flaws.effects: Subtract 3 from rolls to resist fatigue. Take an extra Fatigue level from strenuous activity.

flaws.name: Greedy
flaws.description: You have an excessive desire for wealth and possessions.
flaws.effects: Make Temptation rolls when offered wealth. Must pursue profitable opportunities even when risky.

flaws.name: Hard of Hearing
flaws.description: Your hearing is significantly impaired.
flaws.effects: Subtract 3 from all hearing-based rolls. Others must speak loudly for you to understand clearly.

flaws.name: Hatred
flaws.description: You have an irrational hatred for a specific group or type of person.
flaws.effects: Make Self-Control rolls to avoid acting on your hatred. Subtract 3 from social rolls with the hated group.

flaws.name: Lame
flaws.description: You have difficulty walking due to injury or deformity.
flaws.effects: Your movement rate is halved. Subtract 6 from Athletics rolls involving running or jumping.

flaws.name: Lecherous
flaws.description: You are driven by sexual desire and have difficulty controlling yourself.
flaws.effects: Make Temptation rolls when encountering attractive members of your preferred gender. May act inappropriately.
flaws.notes: Creates social complications and moral challenges

flaws.name: Low Self-Esteem
flaws.description: You lack confidence in your abilities and worth.
flaws.effects: Confidence points only add +1 to totals (instead of +3). Tend to defer to others and doubt yourself.

flaws.name: Mute
flaws.description: You cannot speak.
flaws.effects: Cannot cast spells that require words (most formulaic magic). Communication limited to writing and gestures.

flaws.name: Oath of Fealty
flaws.description: You are bound by oath to serve a lord or institution.
flaws.effects: You must obey your liege's commands and may be called upon for service. Disobedience brings serious consequences.
flaws.requirements: Must define to whom and why
flaws.notes: Limits character freedom but provides connections

flaws.name: Obese
flaws.description: You are significantly overweight.
flaws.effects: Subtract 3 from Athletics and other physical rolls. Increased food requirements and social prejudice.

flaws.name: One-Armed
flaws.description: You have lost the use of one arm.
flaws.effects: Cannot perform two-handed activities. Subtract 6 from appropriate physical rolls. Cannot use two-handed weapons or shields.
flaws.notes: Severe physical limitation affecting many activities

flaws.name: One-Eyed
flaws.description: You have lost the sight in one eye.
flaws.effects: Subtract 3 from vision-based rolls and ranged combat. No depth perception for detailed work.

flaws.name: Overconfident
flaws.description: You consistently overestimate your abilities and chances of success.
flaws.effects: Make Self-Control rolls to avoid taking foolish risks. Tend to underestimate dangers and opponents.

flaws.name: Painful Wound
flaws.description: You suffer from an old injury that causes ongoing pain.
flaws.effects: Subtract 1 from all totals due to constant pain. The wound cannot be fully healed by normal means.
flaws.notes: Constant minor penalty to all actions

flaws.name: Poor
flaws.description: You have very little money or possessions.
flaws.effects: Reduce Wealth level by 3 points. Limited equipment and lifestyle options.

flaws.name: Proud
flaws.description: You have excessive pride and difficulty admitting mistakes or accepting help.
flaws.effects: Make Pride rolls to accept help, admit error, or back down from challenges to your reputation.
flaws.notes: Creates social friction and poor decisions

flaws.name: Reckless
flaws.description: You act without thinking and take unnecessary risks.
flaws.effects: Make Self-Control rolls to avoid acting impulsively in dangerous situations.

flaws.name: Short Attention Span
flaws.description: You have difficulty concentrating on tasks for extended periods.
flaws.effects: Subtract 3 from extended study totals. Difficulty maintaining Concentration duration spells.

flaws.name: Small Frame
flaws.description: You are significantly smaller than normal for your kind.
flaws.effects: Size -1. Subtract 3 from Strength for load-bearing. Easier to hide but reduced physical presence.

flaws.name: Ugly Appearance
flaws.description: You are notably unattractive.
flaws.effects: Subtract 3 from social rolls where appearance matters. May face prejudice and mockery.

flaws.name: Warped
flaws.description: Exposure to raw magic has left you physically or mentally changed.
flaws.effects: You have a minor supernatural quirk or physical mutation. May be unsettling to normal people.

flaws.name: Weak Characteristics
flaws.description: One of your core characteristics is significantly below average.
flaws.effects: Reduce one Characteristic by 3 points, possibly below normal human minimums.
flaws.notes: Severe limitation in one core ability
